entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GroupBy one field, selecting a sub collection for the data that is grouped and paging the groupby return no result for the sub collection. #27721
  • Groub by not working at all #27717
  • Allow using retry policies on explicit transactions using savepoints? #27716

Closed

  • Where clause using List.Contains with one elements results in = instead of IN #27722
  • What causes differences in verbosity between IDesignTimeDbContextFactory class library and console application project? #27704
  • Enabling TPT with default table name. #27702
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite low query performance #27693
  • FileLoadException: System.Runtime v6.0.0 when using scaffolder with latest dotnet-7 feed dotnet-ef tool. #27660
    7.0.0
  • efbundle tries to make a connection to the OnConfiguring connection string despite using --connection parameter #27510

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove needless package references in EFCore. #27720

Merged

  • Update tool to roll forward to latest major version of runtime installed. #27671
    community-contribution
